This is really more of a soft NTR. To be honest I don't feel entirely terrible about it like other ones do since it was clearly shown that they were in a purely platonic relationship. It really just boils down to is he missed his shot. He never took any steps to move beyond that platonic relationship and he suffered because of it. Now I'm not going to pretend that seeing your childhood crush getting fucked by another man (or woman) isn't gonna maybe hurt a little bit, but who the hell is gonna remember a pinky promise made as a child? I can barely remember what I did last week. But enough complaining, ratatatat74 makes stories that hurt, yes, but this one hurt less than some of his other ones because we don't really care enough about the MC or the girl(s) to elicit an actual emotional response. Yeah NTR sucks, but let people enjoy what they want; different folks different strokes.

@yuunika Yeah I've seen some people talking about the "betrayal" in this doujin, but I still feel nothing. It was just a childhood promise. Besides, we get a whopping FOUR panels to care about these two characters' "bond." That's the funny thing about NTR-only artists. They're shit at anything that isn't NTR, and that includes romance, the one thing whose destruction makes the NTR actually mean anything. What a paradox. They replace that development with some forced dialogue that tries REALLY hard to humiliate a cuck that we don't care about. Then, to make us care even less, of course the cuck has to get a boner. I'm just baffled at how people are actually affected by this weak shit. I agree with METROID 2.00. This and Chitose are the two most overrated NTR of 2020. At least Chitose has great art, though.

Anyway, @Aldyn the reason this is so good extent of feeling betrayed. The more you love someone, the more it hurts to see her stolen, the better NTR. Here author gives the classical "Pinky Swear Marriage" cliche that used in a lot of wholesome anime, which makes a connection to them and gives a strong feeling of bond between MC and FMC. You can't get that feeling by simply re-reading. What author does here is destroy that strong bond brutally. Masochists enjoy, normal people become depressed.

My experience of this doujin could probably be sympathized with in some way. When i read this, i felt disgusted, i felt extremely sad for the boyfriend who had his girlfriend stolen from him just from one rough fucking. I wanted to hate this artist forever for all the work he made. But later on i started reading it over and over again, it’s one of my favorite guilty pleasures now. Over time i started realizing that this could happen to anyone. I was scared over that, i was terrified. And so i became possessive over my girlfriend because i don’t want to lose her, this went on for weeks so i read it again, i realized how stupid i was for being so paranoid of this. I started reading it truly for pleasure and started treating my girlfriend better, she’s much more happy now. I think whoever reads this should definitely be warned of how sad it could be. I think personally this is not one of his best works. I liked discipline 1-2 or the grander series the best, but this is a very good doujin
